oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-12-31 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 31, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performers the Carlisles, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marty Robbins; Rod Brasfield; Carlisles; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Marty Robbins -- Call Me Up (And I'll Come Calling On You) (Marty Robbins) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces the Carlisles -- Little Liza Jane (Carlisles) -- Marty Robbins talks -- Old Joe Clark -- Marty Robbins talks -- Blessed Jesus, Should I Fall Don't Let Me Lay (Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert jingle (Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Del Wood -- Rocky Mountain Express (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Robbins, Marty; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Carlisle, Bill; Carlisles (Musical group)
